title: Free Lae'zel
content:
parasite. We won't find out what it is unless we help her get rid of the Tieflings. We convinced the Tieflings to help us kill Lae'zel. After Lae'zel was released, we sided with her against the Tieflings. Lae'zel has been released from the cage. We should speak with her. We invited Lae'zel to our camp.

Free Lae'zel Walkthrough

If Lae'zel is killed on Nautiloid, she will remain dead. After the crashing, you can find Lae'zel in a cage on the north of the wreckage. You can fight the Tieflings to
